content: this striped cardigan is worked in pieces from the bottom up and seamed the hem and cuffs are worked sideways body pieces and sleeves are worked upward directly off the side of hem and cuffs when changing colors work up to the last stitch with the old color work the final pull-through of the last stitch and complete with the new color cut yarn and weave in ends at every color change **sizes ** xs s m l 1x 2x 3x 4x 5x shown in small size **finished measurements ** bust 40 44¼ 48¾ 53 56 60¼ 64¾ 69 72 length 25 25½ 26 27 27½ 28 29 29½ 30 **materials ** premier® yarns elle by me charlotte 60% acrylic 40% wool 5 29 oz/150g 196yds/180m c1 el7002-22 cerise 1 1 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 balls c3 el7002-03 goldenrod 1 1 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 balls c4 el7002-05 muslin 1 1 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 balls c5 el7002-11 lake 2 3 3 3 3 4 4 4 4 balls c6 el7002-10 lichen 1 1 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 balls premier® yarns elle by me charlotte multis 60% acrylic 40% wool 4 4oz/125g 164yds/150m c2 el7003-09 lake multi 1 1 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 balls **hooks & notions ** us size k-10 5 6 5 mm or size needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle 5 5 5 6 6 6 6 6 6 - 1¼ buttons **gauge ** 11 half_double_crochet x 7 row = 4 in patt save time check your gauge
